original_title: Vietnam – Sri Lanka Bilateral Trade & Investment session
original_body_lines: The National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka is organizing bilateral trade & investment discussion between Sri Lanka & Vietnam on Tuesday, 14 March 2023 from 10.00 a.m. to 12.00 noon at the National Chamber Auditorium, No. 450, D.R. Wijewardena Mawatha, Colombo 10. Ambassador of Vietnam to Sri Lanka, Ho Thi Thanh Truc will be the Special Guest Speaker and the session will be assisted by Commercial Counsellor.

The participants will get an opportunity to have a close dialogue with the Ambassador of Vietnam. Sri Lankan Ambassador in Hanoi, Vietnam and Vietnam Chamber of Commerce & Industry (VCCI) in Vietnam are also expected to connect virtually during the event.

The overall purpose of this meeting is to discuss on the current trade environment, investment opportunities/ services, policies and other important information with the view to promote and strengthen bilateral trade and investment between Sri Lanka and Vietnam.

Fabrics, Prepared animal fodder, Man-made filaments, Crepe rubber, Tea, Compounded rubber, Unvulcanised in primary forms or in plates, Sheets or strip, Special woven fabrics; tufted textile fabrics; lace; tapestries; trimmings; embroidery, Wadding, felt & nonwovens special yarns twine, cordage etc.

Cotton, Knitted or crocheted fabrics, Natural rubber, Natural gums, Furniture; bedding, mattresses, lamps, Smoked sheet rubber, Fertilizers, Telephones sets including telephones for cellular networks of other wireless networks, Apparel, Chemical products, Semi-conductor devices etc.
Vietnam’s Main Imports: Computers, electrical products, and parts; machines, instruments, and accessories, telephones, mobile phones and parts thereof; textile fabrics, iron and steel

Vietnam’s Main Exports: Phones & components, Electronic goods, Machinery instrument & accessory, Garment & Textile, Footwear, Wood & wood products, Iron & steel, Means of transport & components, Fishery product, Fibres of all kinds

For reservation for the session, kindly contact Chamber on 011 474 1788/ 2689600, 0762 555 707 (Nirmani/Hiruni/Nishanthi) or email nishanthi@nationalchamber.lk; nirmani@nationalchamber.lk. Reservations will done first come first served basis.
